actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972 to suspend until no later than June 30, 1976, Federal oil and gas leasing in areas seaward of State coastal zones.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior, under the Coastal Zone Management Act, from granting any lease for the exploration and development of oil and gas deposits of the submerged lands of the Outer Continental Shelf which are seaward of the seaward boundary of any coastal State before: (1) approval of the State coastal zone management program; or (2) June 30, 1977, whichever first occurs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972 to suspend until no later than June 30, 1976, Federal oil and gas leasing in areas seaward of State coastal zones.
